name: Crazy Cube (Yesser Kortoba)
description:
This is my first game I made !

The concept is to avoid many obstacles in your way to success ... 

20 levels full of adrenaline and a very cool atmosphere that changes from a level to another.

 I hope that You will enjoy It and have fun playing It.

   

 Don't forget to comment!

Also let me know about your opinion and your review about my first game <3

Here's some images about It : 

PS:  Wait for more AND MORE !

Inspired from Brackeys <3

( In the level 20 use the "Q" button instead of the "A" button ... Srry )
